product_name: Boardworks Raven Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: With a beautiful graphic inspired by Native American art of the Northwest, the Boardworks Raven Adjustable Stand Up Paddle features a full carbon-fiber shaft and adjustable collar clamp system. Carbon fiber shaft provides an extremely lightweight connection to the water. Adjustable length caters to multiple paddlers or multiple paddling applications; adjusts from 66.5 - 92 in. Palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes. ABS edge insert for toughness.
short_description: With a beautiful graphic inspired by Native American art of the Northwest, the Boardworks Raven Adjustable Stand Up Paddle features a full carbon-fiber shaft and adjustable collar clamp system.
